Title: Provides for the recovery, reuse and recycling of hardcover books
Summary: Provides for the recovery, reuse and recycling of hardcover books; prohibits the disposal as solid waste and incineration of hardcover books.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 34 §§27-3401 - 27-3409, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to recovery, reuse and recycling of hardcover books
